title: The News with Rick Sanchez - October 14, 2019 (20:00 ET)
text:
Turkey’s military operation continues in northeastern Syria as Kurdish fighters, formerly sponsored by Washington, join forces with the Syrian government to resist Ankara’s incursion. RT America’s Rachel Blevins reports.

Then former Pentagon official Michael Maloof joins John Huddy (in for Rick Sanchez) to share his insights. RT's Ilya Petrenko reports on Russian President Putin's diplomatic visit to Riyadh and relations between Russia and Saudi Arabia.

Economist and author Dr. Richard Wolff discusses the pending "temporary deal" between China and the US, Wall Street's likely reaction and how it could affect Beijing's meteoric rise. Plus, new insights about a bridge design by Leonardo da Vinci and a breakthrough surgical method to increase memory by as much as 37 percent.
description: Turkey’s military operation continues in northeastern Syria as Kurdish fighters, formerly sponsored by Washington, join forces with the Syrian government to resist Ankara’s incursion
